typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceBibleText
Filter1 derive(BookAbbrev = split(Column_1," ")[1],
		Chapter = toInteger(trim(substring(Column_1, instr(Column_1,":")-2, instr(Column_1,":")-instr(Column_1," ")))),
		Verse = toInteger(substring(Column_1, 1+instr(Column_1,":"), instr(substring(Column_1, 1+instr(Column_1,":"), 5)," ")-1)),
		Contents = substring(Column_1, 6+instr(substring(Column_1, 1+instr(Column_1,":"), 5)," "), 9999)) ~> DerivedColumnBible
sourceBibleText filter(instr(Column_1,":") > 2) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumnBible sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['biblecontents.json'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		BookAbbrev,
		Chapter,
		Verse,
		Contents
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkParquet
